verses.verse: <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4033>travels,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

This is the <S%H8435>history<s%> of the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> being <S%H6240>seventeen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> was <S%H7462>feeding<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> with his <S%H251>brothers.<s%> He was a <S%H5288>boy<s%> with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> and <S%H2153>Zilpah,<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H802>wives.<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1681>report<s%> of them to their <S%H1>father.<s%>

Now <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> more than all his <S%H1121>children,<s%> because he was the <S%H1121>son<s%> of his old <S%H2208>age,<s%> and he <S%H6213>made<s%> him a <S%H3801>coat<s%> of many <S%H6446>colors.<s%>

His <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> him more than all his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and they <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H3201>him,<s%> and couldn't <S%H1696>speak<s%> peaceably to <S%H7965>him.<s%>
<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and he <S%H5046>told<s%> it to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and they <S%H8130>hated<s%> him all the <S%H3254>more.<s%>
He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8085>them,<s%> "Please hear this <S%H2472>dream<s%> which I have <S%H2492>dreamed:<s%>

for <S%H481>behold,<s%> we were binding <S%H485>sheaves<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H485>behold,<s%> my sheaf <S%H6965>arose<s%> and also stood <S%H5324>upright;<s%> and <S%H485>behold,<s%> your sheaves came <S%H5437>around,<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> down to my <S%H485>sheaf.<s%>"

His <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4427>him,<s%> "Will you indeed <S%H4427>reign<s%> over <S%H4910>us?<s%> Or will you indeed have <S%H4910>dominion<s%> over <S%H8130>us?<s%>" They hated him all the <S%H3254>more<s%> for his <S%H2472>dreams<s%> and for his <S%H1697>words.<s%>

He <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> yet <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and <S%H5608>told<s%> it to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2492>"Behold,<s%> I have dreamed yet another <S%H2472>dream:<s%> and <S%H8121>behold,<s%> the sun and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> and <S%H6240>eleven<s%> <S%H3556>stars<s%> bowed down to <S%H7812>me.<s%>"

He <S%H5608>told<s%> it to his <S%H1>father<s%> and to his <S%H251>brothers.<s%> His <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> and said to <S%H2472>him,<s%> "What is this dream that you have <S%H2492>dreamed?<s%> Will I and your <S%H517>mother<s%> and your <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H935>indeed<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to bow ourselves <S%H7812>down<s%> to you to the <S%H776>earth?<s%>"
His <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H7065>envied<s%> <S%H1>him,<s%> but his father kept this <S%H1697>saying<s%> in <S%H8104>mind.<s%>
His <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7462>feed<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6629>flock<s%> in <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H251>"Aren't<s%> your brothers <S%H7462>feeding<s%> the flock in <S%H7927>Shechem?<s%> <S%H3212>Come,<s%> and I will send <S%H7971>you<s%> to <S%H559>them.<s%>" He said to him, "Here I am."

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>him,<s%> "Go <S%H7200>now,<s%> see whether it is <S%H7965>well<s%> with your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H7965>well<s%> with the <S%H6629>flock;<s%> and <S%H7725>bring<s%> me <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>" So he <S%H7971>sent<s%> him out of the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>

A certain <S%H376>man<s%> found <S%H4672>him,<s%> and <S%H8582>behold,<s%> he was wandering in the <S%H7704>field.<s%> The <S%H376>man<s%> asked <S%H7592>him,<s%> <S%H559>"What<s%> are you looking <S%H1245>for?<s%>"
He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am <S%H1245>looking<s%> for my <S%H251>brothers.<s%> <S%H5046>Tell<s%> <S%H375>me,<s%> please, where they are feeding the <S%H7462>flock.<s%>"

The <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "They have <S%H5265>left<s%> <S%H2088>here,<s%> for I <S%H8085>heard<s%> them <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'Let us go to <S%H1886>Dothan.<s%>'" <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> them in <S%H1886>Dothan.<s%>
They <S%H7200>saw<s%> him afar <S%H7350>off,<s%> and before he came <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H5230>them,<s%> they conspired against him to kill <S%H4191>him.<s%>
They <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another,<s%> <S%H1976>"Behold,<s%> this <S%H1167>dreamer<s%> <S%H935>comes.<s%>

<S%H3212>Come<s%> now <S%H2026>therefore,<s%> and let's kill <S%H7993>him,<s%> and cast him into <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H953>pits,<s%> and we will <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H7451><s%> 'An evil <S%H2416>animal<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H7200>him.<s%>' We will see what will become of his <S%H2472>dreams.<s%>"
<S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H5337>it,<s%> and delivered him out of their <S%H559>hand,<s%> and said, <S%H559>"Let<s%>'s not take his <S%H5221>life.<s%>"

<S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8210>them,<s%> "Shed no <S%H1818>blood.<s%> <S%H7993>Throw<s%> him into this <S%H953>pit<s%> that is in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> but <S%H7971>lay<s%> no <S%H3027>hand<s%> on <S%H5337>him<s%>" â€”that he might deliver him out of their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> to <S%H7725>restore<s%> him <S%H7725>to<s%> his <S%H1>father.<s%>

It <S%H3947>happened,<s%> when Joseph came <S%H7993>to<s%> his <S%H953>brothers,<s%> that they stripped <S%H953>Joseph<s%> of <S%H7386>his<s%> <S%H4325>coat,<s%> the coat of many colors that was on him;
and they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H7993>him,<s%> and threw him into the <S%H953>pit.<s%> The <S%H953>pit<s%> was <S%H7386>empty.<s%> There was no water in <S%H4325>it.<s%>

They sat <S%H3427>down<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and they lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and saw a <S%H736>caravan<s%> of <S%H3459>Ishmaelites<s%> was <S%H935>coming<s%> from <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> with their <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> <S%H5219>spices<s%> and <S%H6875>balm<s%> and <S%H3910>myrrh,<s%> <S%H1980>going<s%> to carry it <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
<S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> "What <S%H1215>profit<s%> is it if we <S%H2026>kill<s%> our <S%H251>brother<s%> and <S%H3680>conceal<s%> his <S%H1818>blood?<s%>

<S%H3212>Come,<s%> and <S%H4376>let<s%>'s sell him to the <S%H3459>Ishmaelites,<s%> and not let our <S%H3027>hand<s%> be on <S%H251>him;<s%> for he is our brother, our <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>" His <S%H251>brothers<s%> listened to <S%H8085>him.<s%>

<S%H4084>Midianites<s%> who were <S%H582>merchants<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H4900>by,<s%> and they drew and lifted <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> out of the <S%H953>pit,<s%> and <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> to the <S%H3459>Ishmaelites<s%> for <S%H6242>twenty<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver.<s%> They <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
<S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H953>pit;<s%> and saw that <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H953>wasn't<s%> in the pit; and he <S%H7167>tore<s%> his <S%H899>clothes.<s%>
He <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H3206>child<s%> is no <S%H575>more;<s%> and I, where will I <S%H935>go?<s%>"
They <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H3801>coat,<s%> and <S%H7819>killed<s%> a <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat,<s%> and <S%H2881>dipped<s%> the <S%H3801>coat<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

They <S%H7971>took<s%> the <S%H3801>coat<s%> of many <S%H6446>colors,<s%> and they <S%H935>brought<s%> it to their <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "We have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H5234>this.<s%> Examine <S%H1121>it,<s%> now, whether it is your son's coat or <S%H3801>not.<s%>"

He recognized <S%H5234>it,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is my <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H3801>coat.<s%> An <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>animal<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H3130>him.<s%> Joseph is without <S%H2963>doubt<s%> torn in <S%H2963>pieces.<s%>"

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7167>tore<s%> his <S%H8071>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> on his <S%H4975>waist,<s%> and <S%H56>mourned<s%> for his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

All his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and all his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> <S%H3985>him,<s%> but he refused to be <S%H5162>comforted.<s%> He <S%H559>said,<s%> "For I will go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> to my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H57>mourning.<s%>" His <S%H1>father<s%> wept for <S%H1058>him.<s%>

The <S%H4092>Midianites<s%> <S%H4376>sold<s%> him into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H6318>Potiphar,<s%> an <S%H5631>officer<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s, the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard.<s%>
